#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int main()
{
    int t,n,p,i;
    char s[5];
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %s %d",&n,&s,&p);

        if(s[0]=='e')
        {
            i=1;
            p--;
            while(p)
            {
               i=i+2;
               p--;
            }
            printf("%d\n",i);
        }

        else if(s[0]=='o')
        {
            i=2;
            p--;
            while(p)
            {
               i=i+2;
               p--;
            }
            printf("%d\n",i);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
